item.title: cka真题练习——daemonset
item.description: cka真题练习——daemonset 使用daemonset的方式，保证每个node都有一个nginx容器 Set configuration context $kubectl config use-context k8s.

item.title: cka真题练习——deploy
item.description: cka真题练习——deploy scale the deployment testpod to 4 pods 答案 kubectl scale deploy testpod --replicas=4

item.title: cka真题练习——etcd备份还原

item.title: cka真题练习——ingress
item.description: cka真题练习——ingress Create a new nginx Ingress resource as follows: Name: ping Namespace: ing-internal Exposing service hello on path /hello using service port 80 The availability of service hello can be checked using the following command,which should return hello: curl -kl <INTERNAL_IP>/hello 答案 创建ingress apiVersion: networking.

item.title: cka真题练习——NetworkPolicy
item.description: cka真题练习——NetworkPolicy 在某个ns内部，网络通信只允许访问pod的9200端口 Create a new NetworkPolicy named allow-port-from-namespace that allows Pods in the existing namespace my-app to connect to port 9200 of other pods in the same namespace networkpolicy的配置解读 apiVersion: networking.

item.title: cka真题练习——pod
item.description: cka真题练习——pod 创建一个多容器的pod Create a pod named multi-container with a single app container for each of the following images running in side (there may be between 1 and 4 images specified): nginx + redis + memcached + consul 答案 apiVersion: v1 kind: Pod metadata: name: multi-container spec: containers: - name: nginx image: nginx - name: redis image: redis - name: memcached image: memcached - name: consul image: consul

item.title: cka真题练习——pv
item.description: cka真题练习——pv 创建一个hostPath类型的pv Create a persistent volume with name app-config,of capacity 4Gi and access mode ReadWriteMany.

item.description: cka真题练习——service Reconfigure the existing deployment front-end and add a port specification named http exposing port 80/tcp of the existing container nginx.

item.title: cka真题练习——sidecar

item.title: cka真题练习——日志
item.description: cka真题练习——日志 从名为bar的pod中监听到包含file-not-found的日志，并将其输出到/opt/test/bar目录下 Monitor the logs of pod bar and: Exract log lines corresponding to error file-not-found Write them to /opt/test/bar 答案 kubectl logs bar | grep 'file-not-found' > /opt/test/bar
